body: Kenyan poet attended a meetup under the theme 'Connect, Share, Collaborate' organised by African Digital Art (ADA). ADA is an online forum started by one Ms. Jepchumba who prides herself as digital artist.
original_body: Kenyan poet attended a meetup under the theme 'Connect, Share, Collaborate' organised by African Digital Art (ADA). ADA is an online forum started by one Ms. Jepchumba who prides herself as digital artist.
title: Kenya: African Digital Art makes it happen for Nairobi Designers
